metadata.title: CVE-2019-11579 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: dhcp.c in dhcpcd before 7.2.1 contains a 1-byte read overflow with DHO_OPTSOVERLOADED. It was discovered that dhcpcd did not properly bound certain operations. An attacker could potentially use this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.

criterions.comment: dhcpcd5 package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.1.0-2').
